Mustache November from The Daily Gazette on Vimeo PERIOD

I guess theyre right  it takes one to know one PERIOD  Only another mustached man could have been able to delve so deep into the feelings and motivations hidden behind his fellows frightening fuzz PERIOD  Thank you Gabe for this gem PERIOD

Hey boys next year why dont you WAX them off to the tune   Then you could proudly proclaim

Well done Gabe PERIOD  This is beautiful PERIOD
